title: Kate Winslet on the 'Mare of Easttown' Finale and Becoming the Titular Mare | Bonus Episode
description:
For the second time, Chris and Andy are joined by Kate Winslet to talk about the 'Mare of Easttown' finale reveal, what it meant to her to embody Mare, and acting with an ensemble cast.

Hosts: Chris Ryan and Andy Greenwald
Guest: Kate Winslet
Producer: Kaya McMullen
